plot: "This gives a splendid view of Sir Redvers Buller and the officers of his staff in khaki uniform, coming off the 'Dunottar Castle' at Cape Town, at the opening of the British-Boer War."
title: General Sir Redvers Buller, and Staff, Landing at Cape Town, South Africa
plot_es: "This gives a splendid view of Sir Redvers Buller and the officers of his staff in khaki uniform, coming off the 'Dunottar Castle' at Cape Town, at the opening of the British-Boer War."
original_name: General Sir Redvers Buller, and Staff, Landing at Cape Town, South Africa
plot_en: "This gives a splendid view of Sir Redvers Buller and the officers of his staff in khaki uniform, coming off the 'Dunottar Castle' at Cape Town, at the opening of the British-Boer War."
